location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Plan 4 showing operations against Qurna, 8th December 1914

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:126 x 165 mm, on sheet 152 x 245 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Ordnance Survey, 1921.Distinctive Features:Depth shown by soundings recorded in feet at low water.Plan of Shatt al ’Arab River near Qurna drawn from plan prepared by Lieutenant of H.M.S. ‘Espiegle’ showing the position of British forces on 8 December 1914, including location of the base camp, guns and ships with a note reporting Lewis Pelly reconnoitre.
